component.text:
Activity – Compare Cisco SSL VPN Solutions
Drag the appropriate Cisco SSL VPN Solution type to the statement that it best matches.

Cisco AnyConnect Secure
Mobility Client with SSL
Adaptive security appliance (ASA) proxy devices and port-forwarding are used to access network resources.
A client application must be installed on the end-user device.
Non-corporate managed devices are provided VPN remote access.
A full-access SSL tunnel is established with a Cisco router, adaptive security appliance (ASA) or firewall.
Clients must pass through ASA access lists to be granted use of applications and files.
You have successfully matched the Cisco SSL VPN Solution types to their statements.
You have not successfully matched the Cisco SSL VPN Solution types to their statements. Please click Reset to try again.
